member.summary: Post the message to the service. If is not null, the message is to be posted to the outbound spool to be forwarded to the appropriate Mesh Service. Otherwise, the message is posted to the local spool for local collection.

member.summary: Create a new DARE Envelope from the specified parameters.

member.summary:
Create an administrator catalog entry for the device to the master profile in the context .
This is presented as a static method because creation of an administration context requires a signed AdminEntry to be established before a ContextAdmin can be created for the device.
member.param: The cryptographic machine context (persistence stores, etc).
The master profile to add the device to as an administration device.
The device profile of the administration device to be added as the initial administrator.
The algorithm to use for the adminitrator signature key

member.summary: The default entry

member.name: M:Goedel.Mesh.Client.PersistHost.#cctor
member.summary: Static initiaialization to force the static initialization of MeshItem and CatalogItem.

member.name: M:Goedel.Mesh.Client.PersistHost.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,Goedel.IO.FileStatus,Goedel.Cryptography.Dare.ContainerType,Goedel.Protocol.DataEncoding,Goedel.Cryptography.Dare.CryptoParameters,Goedel.Cryptography.KeyCollection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Open or create a persistence store in specified mode with the specified file name, content type and optional comment.
member.param: Specifies the cryptographic enhancements to be applied to this message.
If true, persistence store must exist and will be opened in read-only mode. If false, persistence store is opened in read/write mode and a new store will be created if none exists.
Type of data to store (the schema name).
Comment to be written to the log.
The file status in which to open the container.
The key collection to use to resolve private keys.
If true read the container to initialize the persistence store.
